body.name: NUK Airflow Glow-in-The-Dark Pacifiers, 6-18 Months, 2 Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: Easy on baby's sensitive skin: the unique shape provides 3 times more airflow and allows for easier breathing
Glow-in-the-dark feature helps babies and parents to easily locate at night
No nipple confusion*: Orthodontic nipple is asymmetrical with a scooped bottom, modeled after mom’s nipple while breastfeeding (*based on market research, 2017, tested with 307 pacifier users)
Nipple is flatter to allow more room for natural sucking motion, slimmer to reduce pressure on jaw and teeth, and narrower to help prevent teeth misalignment
Accepted by 95% of babies* (*based on market research, 2017, tested with 307 pacifier users)
body.description: NUK Airflow Pacifiers have a unique shape that enables 3 times more airflow to prevent irritation on baby’s sensitive skin. The glow-in-the-dark button allows parents and babies to easily find the pacifier at night. To activate the glow-in-the-dark feature, simply expose the pacifier to light for two minutes until the button glows green. Like all NUK pacifiers, Airflow glow-in-the-dark pacifiers feature the improved NUK orthodontic nipple shape that best promotes healthy oral development. NUK’s asymmetrical nipple naturally fits baby’s palate and allows more room for a natural sucking motion, reducing pressure on teeth and jaw, and helping prevent teeth misalignment. The NUK pacifier is modeled after the natural shape of mom’s nipple while breastfeeding, making for an easy transition from breast to pacifier and back. The heart-shaped shield fits perfectly under baby’s nose for easier breathing and less irritation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very bright glow!
reviews.reviewText: These glow so bright, which is great when the baby is crying in the middle of the night in her bassinet. I can just roll over, see the pacifier and give it to her without turning the lights on. She did grab it out of her mouth last night, saw the bright light, and had a mini rave in the middle of the night while she was waving it all around for about 30 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nipples have stayed clean!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these hoping they would lock moisture out of the nipple better like the similar looking flat ones that don't have a handle. These have been great! I use them with a clip for on the go and it's been dropped and everything else and there's still nothing in the nipple after a couple of months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars could be packaged better
reviews.reviewText: product exactly as described. my baby loves nuk and it glows in the dark as promised. i would only suggest packaging be improved as the pacifiers were both just in the bag, no plastic wrap, no zip lock bag, no box or container. I do think your package & handling team should consider concealing your product in the appropriate packaging material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great
reviews.reviewText: I am loving the way my son took so easily to these. He is normally really picky about his binky's and this one did not disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is my 2nd time purchasing these pacifiers. My boy loves them and I love them because I have horrible eye sight especially at night and hate to have to turn a light on (he sleeps in our room) to find my glasses in order to find his pacifier for him when he loses it at night. The fact that these glow make it easy for him to find on his own and easy for me to find if he knocks them out of his crib. He also likes how big the nipple part on these are. I think these are ingenious and a great buy especially for the sleep deprived lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Junior loves these
reviews.reviewText: Our little guy hadn’t had pacifiers for the first six months but we bought these when he started teething. He loves to drool and suck and these. He’s got the nuk bottles so the nipple is the same, just a little wider.These are great for him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to find at night
reviews.reviewText: Even though I still have to wake up in the middle of the night, it kills time searching for a pacifier in the dark

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Package of 2 glow in the dark pacifiers
reviews.reviewText: Get these glow in the dark pacifiers! Often the Nuk ones come in a package that say glow in the dark and then only 1 in 3 or 2 in 5 are actually glow in the dark. These are 2 for 2. They glow really well and are otherwise the same as regular Nuk pacifiers. They are a little easier to wash - the soapy water doesn’t get stuck in the nipple part as much as with the others, so an added bonus. They also have a handle so if you need to attach a strap you can (when they’re not being used in the crib)
